TopicTitle: Channel Art Design Contest! Free Copy of KSP To 1st Place! (Not Assoc With SQUAD)

Articles.Content:
Have a friend who needs copy of KSP but can't afford it? Maybe you are tired of playing the demo? Enter my contest and see if you can win one!

During the last week or so, I have been tirelessly working to separate the video games section of my channel, from the sponsored dirt bikes & automotives sections. I have finished three new title animations, and have created a new ending animation. However, the new channel art that I slapped together is crap, and I really need some professional help on getting it done. Therefore, I am offering a free copy of Kerbal Space Program -or- Space Engineers, gifted through Steam, to the person that creates the most awesome channel art & icon that clearly displays what my channel is all about.

Guidelines, Templates, Old Channel Art, Etc...

\/ \/ \/ \/ \/

The deadline is 10:00pm CST on Sunday, April 13th, 2014

/\ /\ /\ /\ /\

Rules:

- You must be a subscriber to my youtube channel

- All the artwork used must be license-free or 100% original

- The final submission files must be in .xcf (GIMP) format

- The final submission must also be two .png files that are each under 2Mb for direct upload to youtube

- Multiple submissions will be rejected, unless you are specifically submitting an update, and say so in the subject line and description

- The final submission must meet YouTube's guidelines for minimum safe viewing area, while still giving extra "eye-candy" for larger screens (this template is included in the download file)

- Upon transfer of the chosen video game via a Steam gift, the winning artwork(s) will become my sole property and may only be used/reproduced with permission (just to be safe since my channel is monetized)

- All submissions will be shown on a video (maybe), and therefore must be submitted with the understanding that they will be publicly displayed (with credit given to the author's steam name)

Suggestions:

- as you can tell, I prefer red & black

- I also prefer the "28 Days Later" font from dafont.com

- horsepower, speed, adrenaline, aggression

- dirt bikes & automotives depicted as "opposite" from video games

- pay close attention to my three new title animations

- etc etc etc

BE CREATIVE AND GOOD LUCK!!!

Cheaters will be disqualified.

Edited December 29, 2017 by MotoRider42HC
